Emergency Guidelines

üö®

Life Threatening

  • Chest pain
  • Difficulty breathing
  • Severe bleeding
  • Unconsciousness

Action: Call 1911 immediately

‚ö†Ô∏è

Urgent

  • Severe pain
  • High fever
  • Fractures
  • Severe vomiting

Action: Use priority booking

‚ÑπÔ∏è

Non-Urgent

  • Minor injuries
  • Cold symptoms
  • Routine follow-up
  • Prescription refills

Action: Use regular booking
